changes.summary: Created 5 personal & family widgets (FamilyHub, HealthTracker, DocumentIntel, KnowledgeBase, WeeklyDigest) with comprehensive test suite (21 tests). All components are presentational (props-based), use Tailwind dark theme, lucide-react icons, and follow established V2 widget patterns. 543 total tests passing.
decisions_made: FamilyHub widget (80 LOC): Displays family calendar events and family-domain signals. Shows member name with heart icon, event summary, and time. Pink color theme for family signals. Empty state with Users icon.

HealthTracker widget (85 LOC): Shows health_fitness signals, streak display with flame icon, and today's habits checklist (read-only display). Empty state when no health data. Emerald/green color theme for health signals.

DocumentIntel widget (60 LOC): Lists recently analyzed documents with title, summary snippet (truncated), and extraction timestamp. Blue color theme with FileText icon. Empty state when no documents analyzed.

KnowledgeBase widget (85 LOC): Shows recent Notion pages with search functionality. Filters pages by title using controlled search input. Purple color theme with BookOpen icon. Empty state adapts to show 'No matching pages' during search.

WeeklyDigest widget (95 LOC): Weekly review widget showing 3-column stat grid (tasks, signals, streaks) and productivity patterns list with confidence percentages. Includes week start date header. Empty state when no weekly data.
Test coverage: 21 tests total across all 5 widgets. Test helpers: makeFamilyEvent(), makeSignal(), makePattern() with defaults + overrides.
FamilyHub tests (5): loading state, empty events, renders events, shows family signals, and loading state edge case
HealthTracker tests (5): loading state, empty state, streak display, habits checklist, health signals
DocumentIntel tests (3): loading state, empty state, renders documents list
KnowledgeBase tests (4): loading state, empty state, renders pages, search filtering using fireEvent.change
WeeklyDigest tests (4): loading state, empty state, renders summary stats, renders patterns with confidence, handles missing data gracefully

All components use named exports (export const ComponentName), Tailwind dark theme (bg-slate-900/50, bg-slate-800/30, text-white, text-slate-300/400/500), lucide-react icons, and React.FC<Props> pattern
